TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit OperationContractGenerationContext extends System.Object

summary.span: 传递给 方法可以在生成代码之前修改操作协定及其上下文。

span.span: Passed to the method to enable the modification of an operation contract and its context prior to generating code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用传递给 方法的 对象可以在生成代码之前修改代码文档对象模型。Use the object passed to the method to modify the code document object model prior to the generation of code. 通常， 接口是在自定义 实现上实现的，该实现可用于导入自定义 WSDL 元素，或者在服务或操作级别修改代码。Typically, the interface is implemented on a custom implementation that is used to import custom WSDL elements or otherwise modify the code at the service or operation level. 若要在服务级别修改代码，请参见 。To modify the code at the service level, see . ## Examples 下面的示例演示了如何使用传递给 方法的 对象，来添加从自定义 WSDL 元素提取的代码注释。The following example shows the use of the object passed to the method to add code comments extracted from custom WSDL elements. [!code-csharp[C_CustomWSDLExtensions#14](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/c_customwsdlextensions/cs/wsdldocumentationimporter.cs#14)] 下面的代码示例给出了所生成的代码注释。The following code example shows the resulting code comments. [!code-csharp[C_CustomWSDLExtensions#13](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/c_customwsdlextensions/cs/newgeneratedcontract.cs#13)] [!code-vb[C_CustomWSDLExtensions#13](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/c_customwsdlextensions/cs/newgeneratedcontract.vb#13)]
